channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Research on metal-organic frameworks gets the chemistry Nobel Prize
item.description: From capturing carbon dioxide from the atmosphere or sucking water out of dry desert air, the trio's new form of molecular architecture can absorb and...

item.title: Greetings from the Mediterranean, where dolphins swim alongside a migrant rescue ship
item.description: Far-Flung Postcards is a weekly series in which NPR's international team shares moments from their lives and work around the world.

item.title: Why preorders are such a big deal for authors
item.description: Special gifts. Great stories. And economics too!? Can it be true? The Planet Money book is available for preorder.

item.title: How flights are impacted by the government shutdown. And, James Comey's arraignment

item.title: Former FBI director Comey pleads not guilty to federal charges of lying to Congress
item.description: The former FBI director, who has long been one of President Trump's most vocal critics, was indicted last month on two counts stemming from his testim...

item.title: Nigerian minister accused of forging qualifications resigns
item.description: The forgery allegations have sparked outrage among some Nigerians, following a newspaper exposé.

item.title: Century-old grenades found hidden in delivery of onions
item.description: The grenades, dating from 1925, were found in a consignment of onions heading from France to a factory in the northern Dutch province of Zeeland.

item.title: Key US and regional mediators join talks in push to end Gaza war

item.title: Israeli forces intercept new aid flotilla bound for Gaza
item.description: Activists on board nine vessels carrying food and medical supplies for Palestinians will be deported, Israel says.

item.title: 10/8: CBS Morning News
item.description: Government shutdown extends to second week; Blue Origin launch highlights growing space tourism industry.

item.title: Senate prepares to vote again on Day 8 of government shutdown
item.description: The government shutdown stretched into Day 8 on Wednesday with more Senate votes planned. Follow live updates here.

item.description: National Guard troops are positioned outside Chicago and they could soon be in Memphis as the Trump administration pushes ahead with an aggressive pol...

item.title: At least 24 killed as army paraglider bombs Myanmar Buddhist festival
item.description: Locals tell the BBC the carnage has made it hard to identify victims of the military attack.

item.title: Gold surges past $4,000 an ounce as uncertainty fuels rally
item.description: Analysts point to delays in the reporting of economic data due to the US government shutdown as one reason for the rise.

item.title: Excitement — and concerns — over OpenAI's Sora 2 and other AI video tools
item.description: Sora 2 and Meta's "Vibes" feature lets users' imagination run wild in creating online video. That could get messy, tech experts say.

item.title: Trump-backed Van Epps and Democrat Behn win Tennessee primaries for US House special election
